short_summary: Provide A-32 wooden sortation cases and associated spare parts
description: Provide A-32 wooden sortation cases and associated spare parts for various Canada Post Corporation facilities to support ongoing mail sortation operations.
full_summary:
***Government Tender Announcement***
==========================

**Title [English/French]**
-----------------------

* English: A-32 Sortation Cases and Spare Parts
* French: Sortation d'emballages A-32 et pièces détachées

**Reference Number**
-------------------

* MX-22693652552

**Solicitation Number**
---------------------

* GSIR211698

**Important Dates**
-----------------

* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-28
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-10T14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date**: 2023-04-11 (cancelled)

**Background**
-------------

Canada Post Corporation (CPC) is seeking a supplier to provide A-32 wooden sortation cases and associated spare parts for use within various CPC facilities to support ongoing mail sortation operations.

**Procedure**
------------

All bidding documents and information are available on the Merx website ([www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com)). Access to the website and bidding process may incur fees; please visit the website for more information on pricing and availability.

**Contract Details**
-----------------

* Type: Competitive, open bidding
* Status: Cancelled
* Expected Start Date: 2023-04-11 (cancelled)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Contact Person: Tender Solicitation Control Officer
* Contact Information: [tender.control@canadapost.ca](mailto:tender.control@canadapost.ca)
* Phone: 613-734-7863

Note that I did not include any trade agreements, regions of opportunity or delivery in the final output. This is due to the fact that these can be complex needing clarifications and was not included in the requirements. If you require this as well, I will be happy to include this information as well. 

You can also adjust the output to suit your needs. Let me know! 

:) 

I hope this meets your expectations! 

Let me know if you have any further questions or requirements. I'm here to help! 

Stay amazing! 

Your Technical Writer!  
=)
